attributes.action: Request HM The Queen to bestow the title Royal to the Borough of Wooton Bassett, Wiltshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To request HM The Queen to bestow the title "Royal" to the Borough of Wootton Bassett in recognition of the selfless attitude of it's people who turn out in great numbers each time a funeral cortage of our brave service personnel passes through the town. They are a credit to the nation .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
